name: Send a message to guest
title: Send a message to guest

testSteps.description: Given Julia is a user at Elah the Bay

children.description: Julia waits until page element located by css ('input[type="email"]') does become visible
Julia enters "demo@hotelmanager.co" into page element located by css ('input[type="email"]')
Julia clicks on page element located by css ('button[type="submit"], input[type="submit"]')
Julia fills OTP fields with the token
Fill OTP field 1 with token digits
Julia enters the 1th digit of the token into page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(1)')
Julia presses keys  in page element located by css ('input[type="number"]:nth-of-type(1)')

testSteps.description: And Elah the Bay has messaging feature enabled

userStory.storyName: Elah the Bay User sends messages to Guest
userStory.displayName: Elah the Bay User sends messages to Guest

featureTag.name: Elah the Bay User sends messages to Guest
featureTag.displayName: Elah the Bay User sends messages to Guest
